TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi ContentPresenter extends System.Windows.FrameworkElement

span.span: Displays the content of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您通常會使用中的來指定要加入的內容的位置。You typically use the in the of a to specify where the content is to be added. 每隔型別具有在其預設。Every type has a in its default . 當物件處於的，則， ，和屬性取得其值的相同名稱的屬性從。When a object is in a of a , the , , and properties get their values from the properties of the same names of the . 您可以擁有屬性從樣板化父代的其他屬性取得這些屬性的值，藉由設定屬性或繫結至它們。You can have the property get the values of these properties from other properties of the templated parent by setting the property or binding to them. 使用下列邏輯來顯示:The uses the following logic to display the : - 如果上的屬性設定，則，適用於來屬性與產生的和其子項目，如果有的話，會顯示。If the property on the is set, the applies that to the property and the resulting and its child elements, if any, are displayed. 如需詳細資訊物件，請參閱[資料範本化概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information about objects, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). - 如果上的屬性設定，則適用於適當來屬性與產生的和其子項目，如果有的話，會顯示。If the property on the is set, the applies the appropriate to the property and the resulting and its child elements, if any, are displayed. - 如果沒有的型別相關聯，則適用於可來屬性與產生的和其子項目，如果有的話，會顯示。If there is a associated with the type of , the applies that to the property and the resulting and its child elements, if any, are displayed. - 如果已物件，隨即出現。If is a object, the is displayed. 如果已經有父代，發生例外狀況。If the already has a parent, an exception occurs. - 如果沒有可將轉換的型別來，則會使用該與產生的隨即出現。If there is a that converts the type of to a , the uses that and the resulting is displayed. - 如果沒有可將轉換的型別為字串，會使用該，並建立包含該字串。If there is a that converts the type of to a string, the uses that and creates a to contain that string. 隨即顯示。The is displayed. - 如果內容，值屬性會顯示在。If the content is an , the value of the property is displayed in a . - 呼叫方法，並建立包含所傳回的字串。The calls the method on the and creates a to contain the string returned by . 隨即顯示。The is displayed. ## Examples 下列所示如此的。The following shows a that sets the of a . 定義會顯示為內項目。The defines that the appears as an within a element. ，將標記的應該顯示，並置中以垂直和水平內。The marks that the of the should be displayed and centered vertically and horizontally within the . [!code-xaml[StylingIntroSample_snippet#ButtonCT](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylingIntroSample_snippet/CSharp/Window1.xaml#buttonct)] 下圖顯示的外觀時這會套用：The following image shows the appearance of the when this gets applied: ![Button ControlTemplate 範例](~/add/media/stylingintro-buttoncontroltemplate.png "Button ControlTemplate 範例")![Button ControlTemplate sample](~/add/media/stylingintro-buttoncontroltemplate.png "Button ControlTemplate sample")

span.span: This may depend on the content or other properties.
The to use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基底類別會實作以下規則：The base class implements the following rules: 1. 如果設定，請使用它。If is set, use it. 2. 如果設定時，呼叫其方法。If is set, call its method. 如果結果不是`null`，使用它。If the result is not `null`, use it. 3. 尋求其符合已知的資源之間的內容（包括應用程式、 主題和系統資源）。Look for a whose matches the content among the resources known to the (including application, theme, and system resources). 如果有找到，使用它。If one is found, use it. 4. 如果類型很 「 通用 」，使用標準的範本。If the type of is "common", use a standard template. 常見的類型是`String`， ，和。The common types are `String`, , and . 5. 否則，請使用 基本上會將轉換的預設範本字串，並顯示在。Otherwise, use a default template that essentially converts to a string and displays it in a . 在衍生的類別可以覆寫這些規則，並實作其本身。Derived classes can override these rules and implement their own.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您將中的，即會自動顯示的樣板化控制項。When you place a in the of a , it automatically displays the of the templated control. 這表示，如果您設定的您要，則屬性隱含繫結至的的使用中且。This means that if you set the of your to be , the property of the is implicitly bound to the of the that is using that . 若要設定的繫結屬性，您可能要考慮使用屬性。To set up bindings for the properties, you may want to consider using the property. 屬性會指向上樣板化父代以及別名的屬性相關聯的範本和範本選取器屬性自動。The property points to a property on the templated parent as well as aliases the associated template and template selector properties automatically. ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage 一般而言，您可以使用`TemplateBinding`若要將這個屬性值繫結到樣板化控制項的值。Typically, you use `TemplateBinding` to bind this property value to a value on templated control. 針對[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [TemplateBinding 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性應該只是使用是在範本中。This property should only be used when the is in a template. 當範本包含具有設為"`Abc`"，則， ，和屬性的別名是自動`Abc`， `AbcTemplate`，和`AbcTemplateSelector`分別。When a template contains a with set to "`Abc`", the , , and properties of the are automatically aliased to `Abc`, `AbcTemplate`, and `AbcTemplateSelector`, respectively. 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_long](~/includes/net-v35sp1-long-md.md)]，將到 「`Abc`」 也會導致屬性的別名`AbcStringFormat`。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_long](~/includes/net-v35sp1-long-md.md)], setting to "`Abc`" also causes the property to be aliased to `AbcStringFormat`. 最有用的兩個值，這個屬性是 「 內容 」 和 「 標頭 」。The two most useful values for this property are "Content" and "Header". ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例顯示的樣式，示範如何使用屬性：The following example shows a style for a that demonstrates the usage of the property: [!code-xaml[HeaderedContentControl#HeaderedContentControlStyle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedContentControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headeredcontentcontrolstyle)]
